text:
Tuxudos with no tops, but Bartier Cardi style. Cardi B. is the newest member of the topless tuxedo mob, but did so with her own twist— and joined some chic company while doing so. Stars like Bella Hadid, Demi Lovato and Dakota Johnson have all rocked formal menswear in recent months, with a sexy twist: they’ve been ditching their blouses and bras underneath. Stylish is obsessed with this sultry borrowed-from-the-boys-but-better look — it’s the perfect alternative to a cocktail dress for all of your holiday festivities. Want to take the look for a whirl? Check out how the stars are wearing the style!

For the latest beauty and style trends subscribe to our new podcast ‘Get Tressed With Us’ below!
